description: I can’t remember where I heard or read about massaging raw kale with olive oil and a little salt, but it is a very effective way to soften the leaves just a bit if you are not cooking the kale This briny slaw gets its crunch from red cabbage and walnuts
title: Kale and Red Cabbage Slaw With Walnuts
title_page: Kale and Red Cabbage Slaw With Walnuts Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
I can’t remember where I heard or read about massaging raw kale with olive oil and a little salt, but it is a very effective way to soften the leaves just a bit if you are not cooking the kale. This briny slaw gets its crunch from red cabbage and walnuts.
Featured in: Nuts About Greens.
